### Lightweight Autonomous Recording Units Request for Standing Offer

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Title**: Lightweight Autonomous Recording Units
* **Tender Number**: WS4234105977
* **Tender Status**: Closed
* **Tender Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Tender Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User**: Department of the Environment (ECCC)
* **Location**: Canada
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17835828
* **Notice Publication Date**: October 26, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 14, 2023 (14:00:00)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Technical Specifications

* **UNSPSC Code**: 52161500
* **UNSPSC Description**: Audio and visual equipment

#### Tender Description

The Department of the Environment (ECCC) requires the establishment of one (1) or two (2) Standing Offers for the supply of lightweight autonomous recording units. The Standing Offers will be valid for a period of two (2) years, with an optional three (3) year extension.

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Steve Dumaresq (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: steve.dumaresq@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

This tender invitation provides information on a Request for Standing Offer for lightweight autonomous recording units, as required by the Department of the Environment (ECCC) of Environment and Climate Change Canada. The Standing Offers will be awarded based on the lowest price, and the contractor(s) will be responsible for supplying the equipment for a period of two (2) years with an optional three (3) year extension. The Notice URL for this tender invitation can be accessed at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17835828. 
Please note that tender closing date was December 14, 2023; unfortunately, the tender has expired. If you are a contractor you should review the Notice Publication Date to be aware when this tender was originally shared with prospective bidders.   The notice URL still may hold other information of use for you.
